Name: Conflagration
Description: Make every Ignite explodes and inflicts {Damages[0]} damages to target.
Every monster taken in the explosion sudden {Damages[1]} damages and has {OtherValues[0]}% of chances to be affected by a new Ignite.

Name: Default Spell
Description: the DefaultStatus loaded.

Name: Escape
Description: Escape from enemy when you shit your pants
Applies <<Status[0]>>

Name: NeutralForm
Description: Return to the summoner to his Neutral form.

Name: Deflagration
Description: Inflicts {Damages[0]} to all the monster in the area of the Deflagration
Applies <<Status[0]>> to monster hit by the Deflagration

Name: Annihilation
Description:
Autodestruction of the Pet in a big 'BOUM!'
Applies <<Status[0]>> to the Pet before the explosion
Inflicts {Damages[0]} to all the monster in the area of the explosion
Force the summoner back to his NeutralForm

Name: SwitchTarget
Description: Change the target of the Pet

Name: Harpoon
Description: Aim and grab the target toward the player
Applies <<Status[0]>> to the Monster grab after it reached the player

Name: EnergyShield
Description:
Protect the player with an energy shield
The shield applies <<Status[0]>> to the the player
The shield Inflicts {Damages[0]} to all the monster around the player when it breaks

Name: Lightning
Description: Cast a quick ray that damage one target
applies <<Status[0]>> (stacks) to the the player

Name: Thunderstorm
Description:
Cast big Thunderstorm on one enemy
Deals damages depending on the stacks on the player
Remove <<Status[0]>> (stacks) of the the player

Name: Fire Ball
Description: Launch a Fireball in front of the player.
If the Fireball hits a monster,it sudden {Damages[0]} damages and apply <<Status[0]>>

Name: Fire Blessing
Description: The Goddess of fire gives you a <<Status[0]>>.

Name: Gust
Description: Some gust of wind which applies <<Status[0]>> to all allies in an area of {OtherValues[0]} units radius.

Name: Pet AOE
Description: Invocation of the AOE pet.

Name: Pet Mono
Description: Invocation of the monocible pet.

Name: Pet Support
Description: Invocation of the support pet.

Name: Solar Burn
Description:
Invokes an enormous eruption from the sky that explodes at the targeted point.
At the impact, if the Solar Burn hits an entity, it sudden {Damages[0]} damages.
Otherwise, every target caught in the explosion sudden {Damages[1]} damages.
Critical hits inflicts 4x more damages instand of 2x.

Name: Storm Wall
Description:
Focus the strength in the air to create a wall of wind inducing different effects.
The wall goes {OtherValues[0]} units forward and stands during {OtherValues[1]} sec.
Ally entities or projectiles that passes through receive a <<Status[0]>>.
Enemy entities or projectiles that passes through receive a <<Status[1]>>.

Name: Trident Launch
Description: Launch a trident in front of you that deals {Damages[0]} damages to monsters.
Tridents are stackable to a maximum of {NumberOfStacks}.

Name: Wind Strike
Description: You empower your weapon with the power of the storms. It allows you to sweep the area in a {OtherValues[0]} unit radius.
Inflicts {Damages[0]} damages and applies <<Status[0]>> to each monster caught in the attack.
